Text:
Thanks, the first one was awesome so I can't wait to watch this. Screenshots look perfect.
BTW Death Race 2 is a prequel (Frankenstein's origins), not a sequel.

Download with caution, movie lovers! Got an "infringement notice" today from my ISP for sharing this file - it was already downloaded, but I was attempting to "give back." I'm using uTorrent, encrypted headers, and PeerBlock, but nothing else. Time to upgrade my "privacy" suite of utilities.
